channel.title: [Link request] Sort-of Kill count
channel.description:
I remember one tut where you could increase a variable such as a kill count from killing an npc, does anyone have a link to this or a tut themselves on how to do this.
Basically kill one npc, variable++, kill another npc, variable++. Like that.
